org.lenskit.basic

Class PrecomputedItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.lenskit.basic.PrecomputedItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ItemScorer

    public class PrecomputedItemScorer
extends AbstractItemScorer
implements Serializable

    An item scorer that stores a precomputed map of item scores.

    Since:
    3.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • score

        public Result score(long user,
           long item)
        Description copied from class: AbstractItemScorer

        Score a single item.

        This implementation delegates to ItemScorer.scoreWithDetails(long, Collection).

        Specified by:
        score in interface ItemScorer
        Overrides:
        score in class AbstractItemScorer
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate a score.
        item - The item ID to score.
        Returns:
        The score, or null if no score can be generated.

      • scoreWithDetails

        @Nonnull
public ResultMap scoreWithDetails(long user,
                                 @Nonnull
                                 Collection<Long> items)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer

        Score a collection of items and potentially return more details on the scores.

        Specified by:
        scoreWithDetails in interface ItemScorer
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate scores.
        items - The item to score.
        Returns:
        The scores for the items. This result set may not contain all requested items. Implementations that support additional details will return a subclass of ResultMap that provides access to those details.

      • newBuilder

        public static PrecomputedItemScorer.Builder newBuilder()

        Construct a new builder for precomputed item scorers. This is useful for building item scorers for mocks.

        Returns:
        A new builder for item scorers.
